comment._content:
Arthur John Johnson  from Galveston, Texas.

current legislation in Congress for posthumous presidential pardon for the crime of  "transporting women across state lines for immoral purposes"

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: He was in the news in 1912 for his rematch with Jim Flynn, in Las Vegas, New Mexico -- this time for the heavyweight championship of the world. The fight was on July 4, 1912. Flynn cheated with head-butting, and the ref ended the fight, giving victory to Jack Johnson
